name: Real Estate Boss
description:
This is my version of those early 2000s Flash games 'real estate tycoon'. 

Gameplay
Gameplay is simple; buy low and sell high! Watch the new and existing properties like a hawk as their values rise and fall. The properties value will randomly rise and fall.

How to play
You start with 30K in the bank. Spend it wisely! Click to buy a property, and click it again to sell. Once you have earned enough money flipping homes, the mansion's price tag will turn white. Click it to buy the mansion and see how much time it took you and for how much the mansion was bought!

Goal
Your goal is to be able to buy  the mansion across the neighborhood. It's been your ever long lasting dream to buy this mansion. Now that it's for sale, here's your chance! 

Gameplay tip
The owner of the mansion knows his home is in high demand, so the mansion price will ever increase as you play the game.

Are you a true real estate tycoon? Yes? Then prove yourself! Good luck!
